unit.creator: Philodemus || Verhasselt, Gertjan
unit.title: History of the Eleatic and the Atomistic Schools || Fr. 4b PHerc. 327 || Literary Translation

dsl.content: (several lines and some words lost) his piety/impiety (some words lost) is altogether (some words lost) the divine (some words lost) first (some words lost) words/speeches (some words and several lines lost)
